mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION FULL OUTER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no ORDER BY auc_regDate DESC) A) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startseq } AND #{endseq }
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION FULL OUTER JOIN STOCK ON AUCTION.stock_no = STOCK.stock_no ORDER BY auc_join DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
